name: soup archipelago
description:
one day u woke up on piggy isle in the soup archipelago

what will u do???

controls:
arrow keys or wasd to move
z or space or click to place a tile
m for map
h to hide the hud
scroll wheel to do a zoom
tab to take a screenshot (only works on the downloaded version i think)!

on windows it saves to %APPDATA%\Roaming\Godot\app_userdata\SOUP ARCHIPELAGO and on mac it saves to ~/.local/share/godot/app_userdata/SOUP ARCHIPELAGO

have fun! hopefully gonna make a real game outta this but idk
